attributes.action: ban the repetitive advertisements on escalators in the tube.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These are tremendously invasive as they leave little alternative than looking down at the floor to someone who does NOT want to be influenced subconsciously by these advertisements.  One large panel is bad enough.  Forty small ones in a row just turns us into cows.  It is unacceptable that we be quite literally forced to watch the same advertisement for one minute or more, and will eventually result in a body of stupid consumers rather than citizens.
